item.title: 勒纳预测不尽如人意，建筑市场面临挑战
item.description: 建筑商莱纳尔公司（Lennar Corp.）对季度房屋订单的预测未能达到分析师的预期，原因是对经济承受能力的担忧和就业市场的动荡抑制了购房者的需求。【原文：Builder Lennar Corp.’s forecast for quarterly home orders missed analysts’ estimates as affordability concerns and the wavering job market keep a lid on buyer demand.】

item.title: 对冲美国 "贸易推动全球热衷于短线美元赌注
item.description: 事实证明，今年早些时候市场上出现的 "卖美 "情绪是错误的。【原文：It turns out that all the “Sell America” angst swirling in markets earlier this year was misplaced.】

item.title: 参议院作证后，OpenAI 就青少年安全风险接受调查
item.description: 美国一位重要的共和党参议员要求 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）交出有关 ChatGPT 对儿童和青少年构成风险的文件和信息，从而扩大了国会对人工智能聊天机器人的调查。【原文：A key Republican US senator demanded OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman hand over documents and information about the risks ChatGPT poses to children and teens, expanding a congressional probe into artificial intelligence chatbots.】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平将举行通话，TikTok、关税和英伟达问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平周五的通话有望决定 TikTok 的命运，并有可能缓解世界两大经济体之间的贸易紧张局势。【原文：The call Friday between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping promises to determine the fate of TikTok — and potentially ease trade tensions between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: PagSeguro 预计到 2029 年 12 月信贷组合将达到 250 亿巴西雷亚尔
item.description: 巴西 PagSeguro Digital 有限公司周四发布的一份公司简报显示，该公司预计到 2029 年 12 月，其信贷组合将增至 250 亿雷亚尔（合 47 亿美元）。【原文：Brazil’s PagSeguro Digital Ltd. expects its credit portfolio to grow to 25 billion reais ($4.7 billion) by December 2029, according to a company presentation on Thursday.】

item.title: 氧气公司高管称直接空气捕集模式现在无法获得银行支持
item.description: 美国西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp.【原文：Startups developing direct air projects will need to look beyond traditional financing models to scale the technology, according to the president of Occidental Petroleum Corp.’s carbon removal unit.】

item.title: 加拿大结束对美国部分木材关税的抗争，寻求更广泛的协议
item.description: 在加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）寻求与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成贸易协议之际，加拿大撤回了对美国对软木木材征收的部分进口税的异议，加拿大政府称之为 "战略选择"。【原文：Canada withdrew challenges against some import taxes the US levied against softwood lumber in what the government called a “strategic choice,” as Prime Minister Mark Carney seeks a trade deal with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Blackstone 认为信贷利差紧缩助推私募债务繁荣
item.description: 据 Blackstone Inc.称，公司债券利差极小，是全球投资者涌入私募市场的基础，因为私募市场的回报率要高得多。【原文：Razor thin corporate bond spreads are underpinning a global investor push into private markets, which can pay significantly more, according to Blackstone Inc.】

item.title: 即使中国抛售国债，外国国债持有量仍创历史新高
item.description: 海外投资者在 7 月份增持了美国国债，总价值攀升至历史新高；英国和法国国债库存的增加抵消了中国国债库存的下降。【原文：Overseas investors added to their holdings of US Treasuries in July, with the total value climbing to a record high — propelled by gains in the UK and French stockpiles that more than offset a drop in China’s.】

item.title: 人工智能聊天机器人制造商面临青少年安全问题的抉择
item.description: 多年来，人工智能公司一直在关注其技术的理论性、长期性风险，而现在，他们正面临着一个更为紧迫的问题：青少年的心理健康。但首先...【原文：After years of focusing on theoretical, long-term risks of their technologies, AI companies are now being pressed on a more immediate issue: teen mental health. But first…】

item.title: 特朗普希望终止季度收益报告。辩论开始
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统提出了让美国上市公司每年公布两次财报而不是每三个月公布一次财报的想法。他说，这是为了让公司能够专注于长期发展，而不必承受季度截止日期和投资者预期的压力。"9月15日，总统在Truth Social网站上写道："这将节省开支，让管理者专注于公司的正常运营。但是，透明度是金融市场的一个标志，一些分析师和投资者认为，"透明度 "并不意味着 "不透明"。【原文：President Donald Trump floated the idea of letting publicly traded US companies report earnings twice a year instead of every three months. It’s a pitch, he says, to enable companies to focus on long-term growth without the pressure of quarterly deadlines and investor expectations. “This will save money, and allow managers to focus on properly running their companies,” the president wrote on Truth Social on Sept. 15. But transparency is a hallmark of financial markets, and some analysts and inve】

item.title: 阿根廷失业率下降，经济和米莱伊局势缓和
item.description: 尽管阿根廷整体经济活动略有萎缩，但第二季度的失业率仍有所下降，这对求职者和总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）来说是一个喘息的机会，因为面临的挫折越来越多。【原文：Unemployment in Argentina fell in the second quarter even as overall economic activity slightly contracted, a reprieve for job seekers and President Javier Milei amid a growing list of setbacks.】

item.title: 英伟达投资 20 亿英镑推动英国人工智能初创企业发展
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）计划与几家风险投资公司合作，向英国的人工智能初创企业生态系统投资 20 亿英镑（约合 27 亿美元）。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to invest £2 billion ($2.7 billion) in the UK’s artificial intelligence startup ecosystem in partnership with several venture capital companies.】

item.title: 汽车零部件制造商纷纷涉足美国垃圾债券市场
item.description: 本周，三家汽车零部件制造商将在垃圾债券市场上借款，这将推动汽车行业及相关公司的债务发行量在今年增长 6%，即使全球关税上涨可能会对利润造成压力。【原文：Three auto-parts makers are borrowing in the junk-bond market this week, helping to push debt issuance for the car sector and related companies up 6% this year even as rising global tariffs potentially weigh on profits.】

item.title: EQT 称公用事业费用上涨将推动美国能源发展
item.description: 美国最大的天然气生产商之一表示，对能源成本上升的愤怒最终将迫使各州允许在美国建设更多的天然气基础设施。【原文：Anger over rising energy costs will eventually force states to allow more natural gas infrastructure to be built in the US, according to one of the nation’s largest producers of the fuel.】

item.title: 特工处调查柯克枪击案嫌犯的游戏史
item.description: 在 Valve 公司的 Steam 视频游戏平台上，疑似查理-柯克（Charlie Kirk）枪手泰勒-罗宾逊（Tyler Robinson）使用了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的名字作为化名。【原文：Suspected Charlie Kirk shooter Tyler Robinson used Donald Trump’s name as a pseudonym on Valve Corp.’s Steam video-game platform, a fact that’s become part of a profile US law enforcement is building on the alleged assailant.】

item.title: KKR 将 ISC 出售给 Onex，为员工带来丰厚回报
item.description: Onex Partners 将从 KKR & Co.手中收购 Integrated Specialty Coverages，这标志着这家私募股权公司实现了盈利退出，并为这家总部位于加利福尼亚州的保险平台的近 400 名员工提供了现金补偿。【原文：Onex Partners is buying Integrated Specialty Coverages from KKR & Co., marking a profitable exit for the private equity firm and delivering a cash payout for the nearly 400 employees of the California-based insurance platform.】

item.title: Netskope 的市场首秀将为光速带来超过 10 亿美元的意外之财
item.description: 光速创投（Lightspeed Venture Partners）的支持者 Netskope Inc.【原文：Netskope Inc. backer Lightspeed Venture Partners is poised to see a return of more than five times its invested capital in the cybersecurity company from its initial public offering.】

item.title: 市场现实颠覆了英国央行保持量化宽松的计划
item.description: 英国央行周四决定放慢量化紧缩计划的步伐并改变其构成，打破了人们对该政策仍处于自动驾驶状态的幻想。【原文：The Bank of England’s decision to slow the pace and change the make-up of its quantitative tightening plan on Thursday shattered any lingering illusion the policy remains on autopilot.】

item.title: 谷歌在躲避强制出售后为 Chrome 浏览器添加双子座系统
item.description: 谷歌在躲过一场可能导致公司解体的反垄断诉讼两周后，又将其人工智能模型 "双子座"（Gemini）应用到 Chrome 浏览器中。【原文：Google is incorporating its Gemini artificial intelligence model throughout the Chrome browser, just two weeks after dodging an antitrust case that could have broken up the company.】

item.title: Pimco 在德克萨斯州回收商的债务举措为小额贷款带来信用之争
item.description: 一个小投资者正在反击大型资产管理公司，将公司债券领域的犀利手段带到了通常平静的市政金融领域。【原文：A small investor is pushing back against bigger asset managers bringing the sharp-elbowed tactics of the corporate bond world to the normally placid confines of municipal finance.】

item.title: 司法部反垄断局局长：开源人工智能模型促进竞争
item.description: 司法部的一位高级官员说，开发人员能够在很少或不受限制的情况下使用的开放式人工智能模型，对于快速发展的技术市场的竞争至关重要。【原文：Open artificial intelligence models that developers are able to use with few or no restrictions are critical to a competitive market in the rapidly evolving technology, a senior Justice Department official said.】

item.title: 贝森特建议接受人民币对美元汇率
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他对今年以来中国人民币兑美元的走势感到满意，同时指出人民币兑欧元贬值给欧洲经济带来了挑战。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent suggested he’s fine with how China’s yuan has moved against the dollar this year, while pointing out its depreciation against the euro presents a challenge for European economies.】

item.title: 政策的不确定性层出不穷
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 瑞银 AM 赵明称美联储加息将扩大国债利差
item.description: 瑞银资产管理公司（UBS Asset Management）的凯文-赵（Kevin Zhao）认为，由于经济增长回升，美联储明年将不得不转而提高利率，这将导致国债收益率利差急剧扩大。【原文：The Federal Reserve will have to switch to raising interest rates next year because of a pick up in growth, which will cause a dramatic widening in Treasury yield spreads, according to Kevin Zhao of UBS Asset Management.】

item.title: 美国投资者披露持有超过 5%的股份后，Croda 股价大涨
item.description: 在一家美国投资管理公司披露其持有这家英国化学品供应商超过 5% 的投票权后，Croda International Plc 的股价创下了近五个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：Croda International Plc’s stock jumped the most in nearly five months after an American investment management company disclosed it held more than 5% voting rights in the British chemicals supplier.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Netskope 首次公开募股 9.08 亿美元后大涨 21
item.description: 网络安全公司 Netskope Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 9.082 亿美元，其股价在首次交易中大涨 21%。【原文：Netskope Inc.’s shares jumped 21% in its trading debut, after the cybersecurity firm raised $908.2 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 埃克森称能源需求证明化石燃料有必要增长
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）将在未来很长一段时间内寻求化石燃料的增长，以满足其所称从现在到 2050 年 "不会发生实质性变化 "的需求。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. will pursue fossil fuel growth long into the future to meet demand it says will “not materially change” between now and 2050.】

item.title: 高盛美股顶级策略师大卫-科斯汀将于今年退休
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s chief US equity strategist, David Kostin, is set to retire at the end of the year after more than three decades with the investment bank.】

item.title: 房地美美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 6.26
item.description: 房地美数据显示，截至9月18日的一周，30年期固定抵押贷款利率从6.35%降至6.26%。【原文：The 30-year fixed mortgage rate for week ending Sept. 18 fell to 6.26% from 6.35%, Freddie Mac data show.】
